sect1.title: Check All Relevant Files
sect1.para: If you are adding files, you need to run a svn add command on each of them (something like svn add chapter06/kernel*.xml will work).
If you think you're ready to commit, run svn status or svn st to see what changes the commit will make.
Once you know why you're getting each symbol, and they're all correct, you can proceed to the next step.
